data.title: How to Watch Miss USA 2024 Live Online for Free
data.meta_description: The Miss USA pageant makes a significant return this Sunday, following a tumultuous period marked by controversy. In May, former Miss USA Noelia Voigt, representing Utah, resigned and leveled accusations against Laylah Rose, the president and CEO, alleging a toxic work environment.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

The Miss USA pageant makes a significant return this Sunday, following a tumultuous period marked by controversy. In May, former Miss USA Noelia Voigt, representing Utah, resigned and leveled accusations against Laylah Rose, the president and CEO, alleging a toxic work environment. Despite these allegations, Rose continues to lead the organization. As preparations for one of the nationâ€™s longest-standing beauty pageants end , a new Miss USA will be crowned.

Laylah Rose, in a statement to Yahoo Entertainment, reaffirmed her commitment to the organization amidst the scandal. "My mission is to keep this organization/brand elevated and at the forefront of our decision making at all times," she stated.

Fifty-one representatives will compete for the Miss USA title, with the winner advancing to represent the United States at the Miss Universe 2024 competition. The 73rd Miss USA pageant will air live on Sunday, August 4, at 5 p.m. PT/8 p.m. ET on the CW.

As the pageant approaches, the Miss USA organization aims to move past recent controversies and continue its legacy of empowering women. The spotlight will be on the new contenders as they vie for the prestigious title and the opportunity ..
